title: Impeding Justice
description: Detective Inspector Lorne Simpkins comes up against her long-time nemesis, The Unicorn. After leading Simpkins and her partner into a trap, in which Pete is killed, Lorne comes to the conclusion the criminal is obtaining insider information, enabling him to stay one step ahead of them.Can Lorne uncover who the mole is before The Unicorn harms her daughter?
author: M.A. Comley
